data.title: Gila Almagor Wins the Israel Prize for Film
data.meta_description: Born in Haifa in 1939, Almagor begins acting at a young age, with her debut performance at the Habima Theater in Tel Aviv in 1956. data.text: Born in Haifa in 1939, Almagor begins acting at a young age, with her debut performance at the Habima Theater in Tel Aviv in 1956. She soon gains critical acclaim, moving to the film and television world, including her 2005 role in Spielberg’s hit film, “Munich,” her 2007 role in the film “The Debt” and her recurring role in the Israeli TV series “In Therapy.” She is the recipient of numerous prizes and awards.
